txt.en:
You have retrieved a piece of paper written by the hand of a goblin. As you read the scrap of paper, it becomes clear that you have waylaid a messenger of Angmar.

'...while my leader may not feel the same way, it is time that Goblin-town finds powerful friends to help us against all the nasty light-dwellers. Help us, and we will help you....'

Reading this grave news, it becomes clear that this must be shown to someone in Gath Forthnír immediately.

'You have found what? This is dark news indeed if the goblins of Goblin-town have come to pledge themselves to Angmar. We must not let this happen.

'You have taken a key first step by defeating Angmar's messenger, but we must not allow the goblins to remain here. We must stop this alliance at all cost!

'I think I have a plan....'
'I am sorry. I would help you if I could, but without the parchment you have spoken of, there is little I can do.'
You have found a scrap of paper indicating that the goblins of the Misty Mountains and Angmar seek to strengthen their alliance.
Talk to someone at Gath Forthnír who might know something about these pledges.

Gath Forthnír is in the eastern reaches of Angmar, beyond Rammas Deluon.\n\nYou have acquired information about Angmar's allies and plans. You should immediately inform someone at Gath Forthnír of this development.
